suite.name: Availability

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.
kw.msg: Simulating Mouse Over on element 'xpath://div[@class='c-navi-new-list__category c-navi-new-list__category--main']'.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.arg: گوشی موبایل اپل مدل Apple iPhone XS تک سیم کارت ظرفیت 512 گیگابایت
